section.p: This release includes new features and requirements that affect the upgrade procedures.

ul.li: The minimum kernel version for all hosts in a cluster is 3.10.0-327.22.2.el7.x86_64. The kernel is available for RHEL/CentOS 7.1 and 7.2. For optimal results, the 7.2 release is recommended, and the instructions for checking and updating the kernel include an option to update the operating system at the same time. To avoid dependency issues, the kernel update is included in the Docker Engine update procedure.
New and deprecated variables. See appx.
